messages.message: Invalid transferFunction in basic DFD block. For an sRGB vkFormat it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: DFD block #1 transferFunction in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_LINEAR but for vkFormat VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SRGB it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.

messages.message: Invalid sample qualifierFlags in basic DFD block. QualifierFlags must match the expected format of the VkFormat.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample qualifierFlags in basic DFD block are indicating UNORM but they must match the expected sign, float and normalization of VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SRGB.
